name: UIScrollView.KeyboardDismissMode
desc: The manner in which the keyboard is dismissed when a drag begins in the scroll view.

items.name: case none
items.desc: The keyboard does not get dismissed with a drag.

items.name: case onDrag
items.desc: The keyboard is dismissed when a drag begins.

items.name: case interactive
items.desc: The keyboard follows the dragging touch offscreen, and can be pulled upward again to cancel the dismiss.
